title: Need help!!
body: Hello guys, my league client won't open. I found in Avast a league of legends file path. Does anyone know if I delete this? This is on the new updated Avast by the way. Thanks

replies.body:
Avast does this sometimes, for what ever reason it thinks league is a virus, more then likely due to the amount of salt and toxicity in it.

Just open avats, and click on the "Quarantined" sections, fine the League files ad go "Add expectation".

This should make Avast Ignore league and should now work.

Yeah I just did that this morning after I posted this online. Didn't think it would happen again though. Looks like this is going to happen with every patch now. Thanks for that though, appreciate it :) just make sure that as soon as you download a new patch and league does not open to check Avast :D
